Name: pure red-cell aplasia
Definition: A vaginal cancer that has_material_basis in glandular tissue.

Name: congenital hypoplastic anemia
Definition: An agnosia that is a loss of the ability to recognize text.

Name: myelophthisic anemia
Definition: An aplastic anemia that is characterized by displacement of hemopoietic bone-marrow tissue either by fibrosis

Name: sideroblastic anemia
Definition: An aplastic anemia where the bone marrow produces ringed sideroblasts rather than healthy red blood cells (erythrocytes).
